verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came כִּשְׁמֹ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> had heard יָבִ֣ין <S%H2985><s%> And it came to pass when Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king חָצ֑וֹר <S%H2674><s%> of Hazor וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> [those things] that he sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹבָב֙ <S%H3103><s%> to Jobab מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king מָד֔וֹן <S%H4068><s%> of Madon וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and to the king שִׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8110><s%> of Shimron וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and to the king אַכְשָֽׁף׃ <S%H407><s%> of Achshaph

וְֽאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הַמְּלָכִ֞ים <S%H4428><s%> And to the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who מִצְּפ֗וֹן <S%H6828><s%> that [were] on the north בָּהָ֧ר <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains וּבָעֲרָבָ֛ה <S%H6160><s%> and of the plains נֶ֥גֶב <S%H5045><s%> south כִּֽנֲר֖וֹת <S%H3672><s%> of Chinneroth וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֑ה <S%H8219><s%> and in the valley וּבְנָפ֥וֹת <S%H5299><s%> and in the borders דּ֖וֹר <S%H1756><s%> of Dor מִיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> on the west

הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> [And to] the Canaanite מִמִּזְרָ֣ח <S%H4217><s%> on the east וּמִיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> and on the west וְהָאֱמֹרִ֧י <S%H567><s%> and [to] the Amorite וְהַחִתִּ֛י <S%H2850><s%> and the Hittite וְהַפְּרִזִּ֥י <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzite וְהַיְבוּסִ֖י <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusite בָּהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mountains וְהַֽחִוִּי֙ <S%H2340><s%> and [to] the Hivite תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> the foot חֶרְמ֔וֹן <S%H2768><s%> under Hermon בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land הַמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <S%H4709><s%> of Mizpeh

וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> And they went out הֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> they וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַֽחֲנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4264><s%> they and all their hosts עִמָּ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> with עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people רָ֕ב <S%H7227><s%> with them much כַּח֛וֹל <S%H2344><s%> even as the sand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שְׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> shore הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> that [is] upon the sea לָרֹ֑ב <S%H7230><s%> in multitude וְס֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> with horses וָרֶ֖כֶב <S%H7393><s%> and chariots רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> many מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> very

וַיִּוָּ֣עֲד֔וּ <S%H3259><s%> were met together כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all הַמְּלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> And when all these kings הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> they came וַיַּחֲנ֤וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched יַחְדָּו֙ <S%H3162><s%> together אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> at the waters מֵר֔וֹם <S%H4792><s%> of Merom לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> against Israel פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֮ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> Be not afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶם֒ <S%H6440><s%> because כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָחָ֞ר <S%H4279><s%> of them for to morrow כָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> about this time הַזֹּ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> I נֹתֵ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> will I deliver them up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֻּלָּ֛ם <S%H3605><s%> all חֲלָלִ֖ים <S%H2491><s%> all slain לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סוּסֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5483><s%> their horses תְּעַקֵּ֔ר <S%H6131><s%> thou shalt hough וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַרְכְּבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4818><s%> their chariots תִּשְׂרֹ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> and burn בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> with fire

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> came יְהוֹשֻׁ֡עַ <S%H3091><s%> So Joshua וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עַם֩ <S%H5971><s%> and all the people הַמִּלְחָמָ֨ה <S%H4421><s%> of war עִמּ֧וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> and עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> with him against them by the waters מֵר֖וֹם <S%H4792><s%> of Merom פִּתְאֹ֑ם <S%H6597><s%> suddenly וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> and they fell upon בָּהֶֽם׃

וַיִּתְּנֵ֨ם <S%H5414><s%> delivered יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בְּיַֽד־ <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיַּכּוּם֒ <S%H5221><s%> who smote וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֞וּם <S%H7291><s%> them and chased עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far צִיד֣וֹן <S%H6721><s%> Zidon רַבָּ֗ה <S%H7227><s%> them unto great וְעַד֙ <S%H5704><s%> until מִשְׂרְפ֣וֹת מַ֔יִם <S%H4956><s%> and unto Misrephothmaim וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בִּקְעַ֥ת <S%H1237><s%> and unto the valley מִצְפֶּ֖ה <S%H4708><s%> of Mizpeh מִזְרָ֑חָה <S%H4217><s%> eastward וַיַּכֻּ֕ם <S%H5221><s%> and they smote עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בִּלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> no הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <S%H7604><s%> them until they left לָהֶ֖ם שָׂרִֽיד׃ <S%H8300><s%> them none remaining

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did לָהֶם֙ יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> bade ל֖וֹ יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto them as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סוּסֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5483><s%> their horses עִקֵּ֔ר <S%H6131><s%> him he houghed וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַרְכְּבֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4818><s%> their chariots שָׂרַ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> and burnt בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> with fire ס

וַיָּ֨שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> turned back יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בָּעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַהִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he וַיִּלְכֹּ֣ד <S%H3920><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חָצ֔וֹר <S%H2674><s%> Hazor וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכָּ֖הּ <S%H4428><s%> the king הִכָּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> and smote בֶחָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> thereof with the sword כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חָצ֣וֹר <S%H2674><s%> for Hazor לְפָנִ֔ים <S%H6440><s%> beforetime הִ֕יא <S%H1931><s%> he רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> was the head כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַמַּמְלָכ֥וֹת <S%H4467><s%> of all those kingdoms הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וַ֠יַּכּוּ <S%H5221><s%> And they smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַנֶּ֨פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> all the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֤הּ לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> that [were] therein with the edge חֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> of the sword הַֽחֲרֵ֔ם <S%H2763><s%> utterly destroying לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not נוֹתַ֖ר <S%H3498><s%> [them] there was not any left כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every נְשָׁמָ֑ה <S%H5397><s%> to breathe וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חָצ֖וֹר <S%H2674><s%> Hazor שָׂרַ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> and he burnt בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> with fire

וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> And all the cities הַמְּלָכִֽים־ <S%H4428><s%> of those kings הָ֠אֵלֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַלְכֵיהֶ֞ם <S%H4428><s%> and all the kings לָכַ֧ד <S%H3920><s%> take יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> of them did Joshua וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <S%H5221><s%> and smote לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> them with the edge חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword הֶחֱרִ֣ים <S%H2763><s%> [and] he utterly destroyed אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֔ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> them as Moses עֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

רַ֣ק <S%H7535><s%> but כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any הֶעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> But [as for] the cities הָעֹֽמְדוֹת֙ <S%H5975><s%> that stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on תִּלָּ֔ם <S%H8510><s%> still in their strength לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not שְׂרָפָ֖ם <S%H8313><s%> burned יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel זוּלָתִ֛י <S%H2108><s%> none of them save אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חָצ֥וֹר <S%H2674><s%> Hazor לְבַדָּ֖הּ <S%H905><s%> alone שָׂרַ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> burn יְהוֹשֻֽׁעַ׃ <S%H3091><s%> only [that] did Joshua

וְ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> All שְׁלַ֞ל <S%H7998><s%> And all the spoil הֶעָרִ֤ים <S%H5892><s%> of these cities הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> of these וְהַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> and the cattle בָּזְז֥וּ <S%H962><s%> took for a prey לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel רַ֣ק <S%H7535><s%> but אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הָאָדָ֞ם <S%H120><s%> unto themselves but every man הִכּ֣וּ <S%H5221><s%> they smote לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> with the edge חֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הִשְׁמִדָם֙ <S%H8045><s%> until they had destroyed אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no הִשְׁאִ֖ירוּ <S%H7604><s%> them neither left כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> one נְשָׁמָֽה׃ <S%H5314><s%> refresh selves

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> As the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses עַבְדּ֔וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant כֵּן־ <S%H3651><s%> so צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> command מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> so did Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua וְכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> and so עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> and so did יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵסִ֣יר <S%H5493><s%> undone דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> nothing מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> of all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of all that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <S%H3091><s%> So Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> all that land הַזֹּ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הָהָ֤ר <S%H2022><s%> the hills וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַנֶּ֙גֶב֙ <S%H5045><s%> and all the south country וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and all the land הַגֹּ֔שֶׁן <S%H1657><s%> of Goshen וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁפֵלָ֖ה <S%H8219><s%> and the valley וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֲרָבָ֑ה <S%H6160><s%> and the plain וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> and the mountain יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּשְׁפֵלָתֹֽה׃ <S%H8219><s%> and the valley

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָהָ֤ר <S%H2022><s%> [Even] from the mount הֶֽחָלָק֙ <S%H2510><s%> Halak הָעוֹלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> that goeth up שֵׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> to Seir וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far בַּ֤עַל גָּד֙ <S%H1171><s%> even unto Baalgad בְּבִקְעַ֣ת <S%H1237><s%> in the valley הַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> the foot הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> under mount חֶרְמ֑וֹן <S%H2768><s%> Hermon וְאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַלְכֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4428><s%> and all their kings לָכַ֔ד <S%H3920><s%> he took וַיַּכֵּ֖ם <S%H5221><s%> and smote וַיְמִיתֵֽם׃ <S%H4191><s%> them and slew

יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> time רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> a long עָשָׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> made יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמְּלָכִ֥ים <S%H4428><s%> with all those kings הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> war

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> There was not a city אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which הִשְׁלִ֙ימָה֙ <S%H7999><s%> that made peace אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> with the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בִּלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> except הַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> save the Hivites יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants גִבְע֑וֹן <S%H1391><s%> of Gibeon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all לָקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> all [other] they took בַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> in battle
